ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] long time no talk.. =)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For I have seen the Shadow on the moon. And I have more faith in a shadow than in the church ... Of course there are people like me who are not playing

wrote:

>
> Dr Scurrilous PhD
> 8 mains on Solusek Ro :p
>
>

> > This new group is a bit hard to get to at time... been
> > lazy and not

Of course there are people like me who are not playing for various

settings to recieve a daily email so you aren't recieving 30 a day.
The Raven
